Text: The Boy is played by Luke Halpin, who went on to star in "Flipper", and had a long film career. He is now a pilot and marine technician for a film production company.

Thank you!  Love this!

The occasional diagonal "lines" of dots are because this was recorded on a segmented videotape recorder at some point.  Unfortunately, I did not study these, and Google contains absolutely nothing useful on the subject, so I can tell you nothing about them.
